messages.title: Saving Whittington Hospital
messages.content: It’s clear to me that local people feel angry and let down by Labour's cuts to Whittington Hospital.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Petition to save the Whittington: sign the petition at SaveTheWhittington.com to protect Whittington A&E and maternity units by calling for the reversal of cuts and closure.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two-horse race between the Lib Dems and Labour in Islington North. Voting for the Conservatives, Green Party or Labour just helps Gordon Brown hold on.

issues.health: Labour’s mismanagement of our local NHS means that both our A&E and maternity units are under serious threat.

housing.content: I will never stop working to make Islington an even better place to live and work.

leaflet.personalStatement: It’s clear to me that local people feel angry and let down by Labour's cuts to Whittington Hospital.

contactInformation.address: 3N Leroy House, 436 Essex Road, London, N1 3QP

quotes.text: Hundreds of local people have now signed my petition to save the Whittington.

images.caption: It's a two-horse race graph showing Lib Dem and Labour as the main contenders in Islington North.

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. Remember, Islington North is a two-horse race between the Lib Dems and Labour. Voting for the Conservatives or Green Party just helps Gordon Brown hold on.
